conclusion: Analyze image to understand flow path of liquid through baffles.
Image shows containers A, B, C, D at top, connected to E, F, G at bottom via baffles.
Baffles represented by colored lines, arrows indicate liquid flow direction.
A is connected to E via a baffle.
B is connected to F via a baffle.
C is connected to F via a baffle.
D is connected to G via a baffle.
Arrow from A points towards E.
Arrow from B points towards F.
Arrow from C points towards F.
Arrow from D points towards G.
Liquid from A will flow into E.
Liquid from B and C will flow into F.
Liquid from D will flow into G.
